participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, loves to express herself through music and enjoys imaginative play.
participant_1.background: I keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden. I am in preschool. I have red hair. One of my favorite hobbies is gaming. I once wrote a song about a local legend in my town and got to perform it at the local music festival.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Artistic and optimistic, enjoys creating and maintaining strong relationships with friends.
participant_2.background: I enjoy painting, but I could never be a painter if I were blind. I'd brag about the fact that I'm still close to my friends despite all the fame. My favorite food is Italian. I am most proud of my ability to remain positive in spite of my circumstances. I walk through my new mansion and admire all the places where I can use my power tools to make it even better.

content.text: I love gaming.  I once wrote a song about a local legend in my town and got to perform it at the local music festival.
I enjoy painting, but I could never be a painter if I were blind.
I like to keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden.
I walk through my new mansion and admire all the places where I can use my power tools to make it even better.
I am in preschool.  I have red hair.
I'd brag about the fact that I'm still close to my friends despite all the fame.
I am most proud of my ability to remain positive in spite of my circumstances.
What kind of power tools do you like to use?
I like to use power tools for woodworking.
